title: Modlinks
description: A list of mods for MIO: Memories in Orbit.

id.description: A UUID used for identifying your mod. You can generate one at https://www.uuidgenerator.net/version4

titleSlug.description: The repository slug from the URL of your github repository. Used for linking to the repository.

displayTitle.description: How you want your mod's name to be displayed.

authorSlug.description: The username slug from the URL of your github account. Used for linking to the repository and your account.

displayAuthor.description: How you want your username to be displayed.

versions.description: A list of downloads for your mod, by semantic version.

^(0|[1-9]\\d*)\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*)\\.(0|[1-9.description: URL to the .dll download for your mod.

configFiles.description: A list of paths that your mod uses inside MIO/modconfig. For example, if your mod uses `modconfig/noclip/keybinds.txt`, you would put `"configFiles": ["noclip/keybinds.txt"]`.

dependencies.description: A list of UUIDs of mods your mod depends on. You don't have to put Modding API.
